about.title: MY JOURNEY SO FAR
about.description: My career started with a background in Architecture, where I worked for several years. Always curious about technology, I felt the need to go beyond physical plans and projects. I decided to seek an international experience in Portugal, where I recently completed a course in Software Development. During the course, I explored various areas of technology, but it was in UX and UI that I truly found my passion. This field allows me to apply my previous knowledge of design and usability, while engaging in everything I love: interacting with people, creating designs, and designing interfaces, always prioritizing the user experience. Now, after completing my software development course, I am specializing and seeking opportunities in the UX and UI field.

work.title: EXPLORE MY IDEAS
work.floradescription: Have you ever thought how great it would be to always have your plants healthy and radiant even when you need to be away from home for a few days? Well, now it's possible, and that's why you're going to love this project!
work.player2description: I know you love gaming and the geek universe but struggle to find a partner. Relax, with this app, your love life is about to take off!
work.newdescription: I dont know what Im gonna do here

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.description: I hope you enjoyed the visit! I am open to receiving your feedback and, of course, I would be very happy if we have the opportunity to discuss future projects!
